name: Match Three (Soul_AvC)
description:
Drag and drop the pieces to switch them. It's just one level but wanted to upload it anyways :)

- Dark pieces are collectibles that add points when they reach the last row.

- White square around a piece means 1 shield.

- White square and wihte circle around a piece means 2 shields.

All credits to Wilmer Lim and his amazing Udemy Course!
